name: Owls Away!
description:
The summer Owl to beat is here! How long can you make the owl fly? Touch the bombs to score but keep in mind with the sheer force of gravity to keep yourself afloat! How tricky can this get? Let's play Owl's Away!
* No IAPs, No crippled gameplay, No Trials, No limits
* Game runs on all iPhones, iPod Touches and iPads running 5.1.1 or higher for wide compatibility
* Small file size
* Early access sale price


No crippled gameplay, No data requirements. No micro transactions. No IAP. Just game.

https://www.facebook.com/reddstudiosapps
Mail: reddstudios@outlook.com

Show us some love and thank you for playing. Enjoy!
